The third block from the south.

East.

East of the northernmost block.

East.

Okay, I can write an F by placing 9 purple blocks, in three rows, one with 5 and two with 2 blocks. I will place the first block of the first row 3 blocks from the south side and 5 blocks from the east side, facing north. I will place the first block of the second row east of the third block from the south, facing east, and I will place the first block of the third row east of the northernmost block, facing east.
